posts.post_content:
Reduced to $39 for both (I'll pay the shipping) or make an offer if you're interested in only one of the cards.
Paypal please.
Both graded as PSA 2 with the Frill being 2(MK).  
Sorry, no scanner at home.  The fronts are very nice and do not have any creases or marks.  The back of the Bescher has a tiny bit of paper loss and the Frill has some writing on the back.
